name: dry food for cats
title: Felix Sensations · dry food for cats · chicken, turkey and vegetable flavor
description: Felix dry food for cats chicken, turkey and vegetable flavor A whole world of sensations

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Cereals, Meat and animal derivatives (20%, of which 2% turkey and 2% chicken in diamond and drumstick shape kibbles *), Vegetable protein extracts, Oils and fats, Derivatives of vegetable origin, minerals, Yeasts, Vegetables (0.6% dehydrated vegetables equivalent to 4% rehydrated vegetables in vegetables in flower and disc shape kibbles **).*Total content in product: 1.5% turkey and 1.5% chicken**Total content in product: 1% rehydrated vegetablesTypical product composition: diamond and drumstick shape kibbles 75%; flower and disc shape kibbles 25%.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 12500; Vit D3: 1000; Vit E: 85; mg/kg: 3b103: (Fe: 47); 3b202: (I: 1.5); 3b405: (Cu: 8.9); 3b503: (Mn: 5.1); 3b605: (Zn: 66); 3b801: (Se: 0.1); taurine: 870.Colourants(1) and antioxidants(1)no artificial colourants.Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 12500; Vit D3: 1000; Vit E: 85; mg/kg: Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 47); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 1.5); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 8.9); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 5.1); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn: 66); Sodium selenite: (Se: 0.1); taurine: 870.Colourants(1) and antioxidants(1)no artificial colourants.

usageInformation.usage: There's more to it than that! These delicious meals are a source of essential omega 6 fatty acids and have the right balance of balanced minerals and vitamins - this wealth of good ingredients will cover your cat's daily requirements when fed according to the recommended feeding regime of 100%.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Every colorful meal from FELIX Meaty Sensations is filled to the brim with deliciously fragrant and crunchy tasty croquettes in many different shapes and with a sensational taste of chicken and turkey. The complete and balanced meal for your rascal to get the tasty mix that little rascals need for a life of adventure.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide:The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight. Fresh, clean drinking water should always be available. Sufficient consumption of water is a necessary part of healthy, every day nutrition.

otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.
